title: 383: The Jess Interview
itunes:title: 383: The Jess Interview
description:
(TW: su*cide and bipolar) The Broads are back and here for an intimate one. Bekah sits Jess down to get all the answers about her history. Jess puts her past and upbringing all out on the table, discusses the truth about how she was raised, the adoption of her sister, the first few years of marriage being the toughest of her life, what bipolar and her diagnosis really looked like for her, how her mental health condition helped her step away from the church…the beautiful parts, the painful parts and more! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***STAMPS.COM: Get a 4-week trial, free postage and a digital scale at STAMPS.COM, click on the Microphone at the top of the page and enter code CHATTY

***KIWICO: Get 30% off your first month plus FREE shipping on any crate line with code CHATTY at KIWICO.COM 

***FAVOR: go to HEYFAVOR.COM/CHATTY for a $!0 donation to bedsider.org for every Chatty Broads listener who becomes a patient

***ROTHYS: Get $20 off your first purchase today at ROTHYS.COM/CHATTY

***CARE/OF: Go to TAKECAREOF.COM and enter code CHATTY50 for 50% off your first Care/of order!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
